channel.title: Check Ping
channel.description:
Hi i am having a problem with my server and i was wondering where i may find the player ping.
I am wanting to know this because i fear the ping is above a certain number the players may be automaticly "kicked" from my server. Only some are able to join. Others only see "loading please wait" and then they say the only way to describe what happend it that they were kicked.I have looked at the "kicklogs" also that is EMPTY.
If you think you can help please reply.

item.title: Check Ping
item.dc:creator: @adbe adbe
item.description:
@adbe wrote:

Hi i am having a problem with my server and i was wondering where i may find the player ping.

I am wanting to know this because i fear the ping is above a certain number the players may be automaticly “kicked” from my server. Only some are able to join. Others only see “loading please wait”
and then they say the only way to describe what happend it that they were kicked.I have looked at the “kicklogs” also that is EMPTY.
